p: Statistical analyses were performed using STATA 13.1. Cumulative incidence, considering the residing population as at risk population, was used as measure of frequency of morbidity. Papulation census from the year 2016 was used ( http://demo.istat.it/). Spatial distribution of cases (probable and confirmed) was graphically reported as cumulative incidence per 100,000 residents and plotted on a choropleth map using the 361 administrative area of Lazio (i.e. 346 towns of Lazio and the 15 municipia of Rome).
